fgeo.habitat 0.0.0.9003
  • Reference

  • fgeo

Dataframe the output of krig_lst().

Source: R/to_df.R
to_df.krig_lst.Rd

Dataframe the output of krig_lst().

# S3 method for krig_lst
to_df(.x, name = "var", item = "df", ...)

Arguments

.x

The output of krig_lst().
name

Name for the column to hold soil variable-names.
item

Character string; either "df" or "df.poly".
...

Arguments passed on to to_df

.x

An fgeo object of supported class.

Value

A dataframe.

Examples

vars <- c("c", "p")
krig_lst <- krig_lst(soil_fake, vars, quiet = TRUE)
to_df(krig_lst)
